Description.Text: Fox Country Hotel is popular with business people and weekenders in the quiet surroundings. It is in a designated area of outstanding natural beauty. Guests return time and time again. Property offers amenities as banquet facilities, bar, barbeque area, business center, concierge, conference facilities, currency exchange, disabled facilities, doctor on call, high-speed Internet access, lobby, wireless Internet, lobby, non-smoking rooms, reception, restaurant, room service, safe deposit box, secretarial services, smoke-free hotel and tour desk.
This 17th Century Inn is situated in serving in woodlands in Ibstone Common, yet only 1.5 miles from M40 at junc 5.

Double Room - Luxury room with one double bed offer HD Plasma TV with freeview, iPod docking station, complimentary 'Crabtree & Evelyn' aromatherapy toiletries, Villeroy & Boch sanitary ware, Hansgrohe rain dance power shower, free wi-fi Internet access, tea and coffee making facilities, iron, ironing board, alarm clock, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, disabled facilities, ensuite /private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, kettle, mini bar, modem/date port connection, non-smoking rooms, radio, refrigerator, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, telephone and voice mail.
Triple Room - Luxury room with one double bed plus single bed offer HD Plasma TV with freeview, iPod docking station, complimentary 'Crabtree & Evelyn' aromatherapy toiletries, Villeroy & Boch sanitary ware, Hansgrohe rain dance power shower, free wi-fi Internet access, tea and coffee making facilities, iron, ironing board, alarm clock, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, disabled facilities, ensuite /private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, kettle, mini bar, modem/date port connection, non-smoking rooms, radio, refrigerator, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, telephone and voice mail.
Single Room - Luxury room with one single bed offer HD Plasma TV with freeview, iPod docking station, complimentary 'Crabtree & Evelyn' aromatherapy toiletries, Villeroy & Boch sanitary ware, Hansgrohe rain dance power shower, free wi-fi Internet access, tea and coffee making facilities, iron, ironing board, alarm clock, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, disabled facilities, ensuite /private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, kettle, mini bar, modem/date port connection, non-smoking rooms, radio, refrigerator, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, telephone and voice mail.
